mapper.select: select * from t_mall_shoppingcar tms where tms.yh_id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_mall_shoppingcar tms set tms.tjshl=#{tjshl} where tms.yh_id=#{yh_id}
mapper.select: select pi.url as shp_tp_url from t_mall_product_sku_info si, t_mall_product_image pi where si.shp_img = pi.shp_id and si.sku_id = #{shpid}
mapper.update: update t_mall_shoppingcar set sku_jg = #{tjshl} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ms.hj) price FROM t_mall_shoppingcar ms, t_mall_product mp, t_mall_sku sk WHERE ms.shp_id = mp.id AND ms.sku_id = sk.id AND ms.shfxz > 0 and ms.id in (${ids})
mapper.delete: delete from t_mall_shoppingcar where id in (${ids})
